text: He laid them next to the Heart of Gold was being systematically scanned. #RestaurantAtTheEndOfTheUniverse

passages.fragment: He laid them next to the
passages.source_name: Restaurant At The End Of The Universe
passages.full_quote: <used>He laid them next to the</used> letters S, I, T, E. "Exquisite," he said, "on a triple word score"

passages.fragment: them next to the Heart of Gold
passages.full_quote: The aircar flung itself through the air at R17 and above, deposited <used>them next to the Heart of Gold</used> which stood starkly on the frozen ground like a bleached bone, and then precipitately hurled itself back in the direction whence they had come, presumably on important business of its own
One of the side effects of work on <used>the Heart of Gold was</used> a whole string of pretty meaningless coincidences

passages.fragment: Heart of Gold was being systematically scanned
passages.source_name: Restaurant At The End Of The Universe
passages.full_quote: He heaved his monumentally vile body round in his ill-fitting, slimy seat and stared at the monitor screen on which the starship <used>Heart of Gold was being systematically scanned</used>
